page.title: 07PUBLIC ATTITUDES IN MIDHURST
page.content: In Midhurst and its surrounding area conservation is the main subject of concern to residents.The area has many fine old buildings and people want all new ones to blend with them.They want the woodlands and the Downs to be preserved,not cleared or ploghed for farming.Most people want the villages to retain their present size,and the whole environment to stay as it is.Litter,oil drilling,noise and dogs fouling pavements all cause loud protests.There are not many large protest groups but small groups inform the local press of their concern.It is mainly elderly and fairly wealthy people who complain for Midhurst is an affluent area and there is more than the usual number of elderly residents with long-standing connections with the district.
